result.arabic_text: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
result.translation: (2) Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture[1811] that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
result.footnotes: [1811]- i.e., a combination of the male and female substance, within the womb.
